DOC.brief_summary: Rationale `` BIO-OHS '' study ( Prevalence Obesity Hypoventilation Syndrome ) : The overall prevalence Obesity Hypoventilation Syndrome ( OHS ) never directly assess general population . Actually , prevalence assess patient referred sleep clinic potential diagnosis sleep-disordered breathing patient already diagnose sleep apnea . The purpose study determine prevalence Obesity Hypoventilation syndrome obese patient refer clinical laboratory regular follow-up medical analysis .
DOC.criteria: 18 year old an BMI 30 kg/M2 Stable state ( respiratory , metabolic cardiovascular ) last 2 month Addressed clinical lab blood checkup whatever prescription No social security Non cooperative patient , judge investigator
